医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
正在进行的研究调查超加工食品是否影响年轻人的大脑化学和肥胖风险研究人员正在探索富含超加工食品的饮食如何影响大脑的奖励处理，并可能导致年轻人食物摄入量增加和肥胖。该试验旨在阐明这些食物在关键发育阶段对大脑化学和决策的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Ongoing-study-investigates-if-ultra-processed-foods-influence-brain-chemistry-and-obesity-risk-in-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Ongoing-study-investigates-if-ultra-processed-foods-influence-brain-chemistry-and-obesity-risk-in-young-adults.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ad51a98-c9be-483d-ab26-cf9b61669b46 Thu, 09 Nov 2023 23:03:00 -0500 Ongoing study investigates if ultra-processed foods influence brain chemistry and obesity risk in young adults
在灵长类动物研究中，粘膜疫苗显示出对 SARS-CoV-2 Omicron 的持久防御作用在这项开创性的研究中，研究人员开发了一种粘膜腺病毒载体疫苗 ChAd-SARS-CoV-2-S，该疫苗在非人类灵长类动物中表现出针对具有挑战性的 Omicron 变体的持续而强大的免疫力，这为持久的 COVID-19 保护策略指明了一个有希望的方向。与传统的肌肉注射疫苗不同，这种粘膜疫苗引发了全面的免疫反应，可能为更有效、更持久的 COVID-19 疫苗铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Mucosal-vaccine-shows- permanent-defense-against-SARS-CoV-2-Omicron-in-primate-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Mucosal-vaccine-shows- permanent-defense-against-SARS-CoV-2-Omicron-in-primate-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e4ea112-0d00-4619-9794-2febf2c0a1bf Thu, 09 Nov 2023 22:39:00 -0500 Mucosal vaccine shows lasting defense against SARS-CoV-2 Omicron in primate study
21 世纪儿科病毒威胁激增：呼吁采取“同一个健康”方法《儿科研究》的范围界定审查审视了 21 世纪儿科病毒性疾病的兴起，并强调了整合人类、动物和生态系统健康的“同一个健康”方法的重要性，以有效应对这些新出现和重新出现的传染病威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Pediatric-viral-threats-surge-in-the-21st- century-A-call-for-One-Health-approach.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Pediatric-viral-threats-surge-in-the-21st- century-A-call-for-One-Health-approach.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd8b4349-97cb-490f-9b09-715b8f9be5ff Thu, 09 Nov 2023 22:13:00 -0500 Pediatric viral threats surge in the 21st century: A call for One Health approach
新的审查表明，过敏与长期感染新冠病毒的风险增加有关系统评价表明，哮喘和过敏性鼻炎等已有的过敏性疾病可能与长期感染新冠病毒的风险增加有关。尽管有一些证据，但由于潜在的偏见和混杂因素，确定性仍然很低，这凸显出需要进行更严格的研究来确定这些过敏对长期 COVID-19 症状的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Allergies-linked-to-heightened-risk-of-long-COVID-new-review-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Allergies-linked-to-heightened-risk-of-long-COVID-new-review-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=341e1b2c-4486-4b50-92fa-99ee200e47dd Thu, 09 Nov 2023 21:46:00 -0500 Allergies linked to heightened risk of long COVID, new review suggests
研究编制了与前列腺癌风险相关的最全面的遗传变异列表一个遍布全球的科学团队编制了与前列腺癌风险相关的最全面的遗传变异列表；共 451 条 -;通过全基因组分析，这是迄今为止规模最大、最多样化的前列腺癌遗传学研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Study-compiles-the-most-compressive-list-of-genic-variants-linked-with-prostate-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Study-compiles-the-most-compressive-list-of-genic-variants-linked-with-prostate-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=439bf7e6-9640-4335-b9b3-8ecbca6fe0f8 Thu, 09 Nov 2023 13:17:00 -0500 Study compiles the most comprehensive list of genetic variants associated with prostate cancer risk
研究人员确定了基于预测性脑成像的青少年精神疾病生物标志物精神疾病的研究和治疗因缺乏生物标志物而受到阻碍，生物标志物是可以帮助诊断、跟踪、预测和治疗疾病的客观生物或生理标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Researchers-identify-predictive-brain-imaging-based-biomarkers-of-mental-illness-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Researchers-identify-predictive-brain-imaging-based-biomarkers-of-mental-illness-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f85b0284-2d5f-461c-a59b-4c03e8be1257 Thu, 09 Nov 2023 13:10:01 -0500 Researchers identify predictive brain imaging-based biomarkers of mental illness in adolescents
ICMRA 庆祝药品监管全球合作十周年今年是 MHRA 与其他七个全球监管机构共同建立 ICMRA 的十年，旨在满足医药产品监管领域强有力的全球合作和协调的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/ICMRA-celebrates-10-years-of-global-cooperation-in-regulate-medicinal-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/ICMRA-celebrates-10-years-of-global-cooperation-in-regulate-medicinal-products.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=786ee682-82d6-4c4c-8b68-e9e374957505 Thu, 09 Nov 2023 13:03:12 -0500 ICMRA celebrates 10 years of global cooperation in regulating medicinal products
Bio Farma 的 Bio-TCV 伤寒结合疫苗在获得上市批准后在印度尼西亚获得许可国际疫苗研究所 (IVI) 是一个致力于为全球健康发现、开发和提供安全、有效且负担得起的疫苗的国际组织，而 Bio Farma 是一家总部位于印度尼西亚西爪哇的生物技术公司，今天宣布 Bio Farma Farma 的 Bio-TCV 伤寒结合疫苗 (TCV) 在获得国家监管机构 Badan Penawas Obat dan Makanan (BPOM) 的营销批准后，在印度尼西亚获得许可。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Bio-Farmas-Bio-TCV-typhoid-conjugate-vaccine-licensed-in-Indonesia-following-marketing-approval.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Bio-Farmas-Bio-TCV-typhoid-conjugate-vaccine-licensed-in-Indonesia-following-marketing-approval.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7feaac39-0161-4a8b-aad3-84d95891a243 Thu, 09 Nov 2023 12:48:39 -0500 Bio Farma's Bio-TCV typhoid conjugate vaccine licensed in Indonesia following marketing approval
纽约大学朗格健康中心为退伍军人进行世界首例全眼和部分面部移植手术纽约大学朗格健康中心的外科团队为一名来自阿肯色州的 46 岁退伍军人进行了世界首例全眼和部分面部移植手术，该退伍军人在一次与工作有关的高压电气事故中幸存下来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/NYU-Langone-Health-performs-the-worlds-first-whole-eye-and-partial-face-transplant-for-military-veteran.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/NYU-Langone-Health-performs-the-worlds-first-whole-eye-and-partial-face-transplant-for-military-veteran.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e6b5c64-0ac2-45ff-a456-38cbc415604a Thu, 09 Nov 2023 12:34:54 -0500 NYU Langone Health performs the world's first whole-eye and partial-face transplant for military veteran
科学家发现可逃避耐药性的对肾脏友好的抗真菌药物在这项研究中，研究人员生产了多烯类强效抗真菌药物，且无肾毒性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Scientists-discover-kidney-friend-antifungal-that-evades-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Scientists-discover-kidney-friend-antifungal-that-evades-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ac19fe1-e0b5-4eaa-8e3f-a0c502935a0f Thu, 09 Nov 2023 12:25:00 -0500 Scientists discover kidney-friendly antifungal that evades resistance
